categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A member of the Jedi Order was active during the Great Sith War, during which he led a bombing raid against the Mandalorian Crusaders. One of his bombs killed Varda, the Mandalorian lover of Jedi Knight Dorjander Kace, who had been living among the Mandalorians since they captured him earlier in the war.
